title: Morning Joe: Memorial Day
description: President Biden delivered remarks Sunday during the Memorial Day observance at War Memorial Plaza near the Delaware Memorial Bridge, and he commended military service members. Also, President Biden's approval rating stands at 62 percent in new polling.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: President Biden delivered remarks Sunday during the Memorial Day observance at War Memorial Plaza near the Delaware Memorial Bridge, and he commended military service members. Also, President Biden's approval rating stands at 62 percent in new polling.
